Name: Antioch: Scarlet Bay
About the game: Play as one of two detectives working together to solve an intriguing crime. The adventure will take you to the city of Antioch, a dark metropolis between the mountains and the sea. Your partner in the game is a real person : a complete stranger or a friend. Both players decide on the direction of the story - you won't always agree with your partner. How will you choose to pursue the case? The city is filled with characters with their own motivations and behaviors . Discovering their stories (or choosing not to) will change your experience of the story. French author specialized in interactive fiction , working in different fields such as books where you are the hero, role-playing games, comics and video games. Creator of Out There and Game of Roles . Shape a unique relationship between the two protagonists Discover a dozen different endings depending on your choices. The game is fully multiplatform (PC / MAC / LINUX - Android / iOS) . Play with your friends or strangers on all devices .
